titles.title: Ride On, Ride On in Majesty!

comments.comment: This hymnal has not been proofed - data may be incomplete or incorrect

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Ride on, ride on in majesty! Hear all the tribes hosanna cry; O Savior meek, pursue Your road with palms and scattered garments stroked.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Ride on, ride on in majesty! In lowly pomp ride on to die. O Christ, Your triumphs now begin oâ€™er captive death and conquered sin.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Ride on, ride on in majesty! The hosts of angels in the sky look down with sad and wond'ring eyes to see th'approaching Sacrifice.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Ride on, ride on in majesty! Your last and fiercest strife is nigh. The Father on His sapphire throne awaits His own anointed Son.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Ride on, ride on in majesty! In lowly pomp ride on to die, bow Your meek head to mortal pain, then take, O Christ, Your pow'r and reign.
